data.title: Darlington Borough Council's website will be offline for essential repairs
data.meta_description: DARLINGTON Borough Council's websites and phone lines will be unavailable from 8am on Saturday morning while essential maintenance work is carried…
data.text:
This will affect all council websites, including Healthy Darlington, Darlington Hippodrome and the main DBC website.

Members of the public can still contact out-of-hours services during this time:

• If you are a Council tenant and have an urgent housing repair, call 01325-384088 or 01325-380604

• To report a stray dog, call 01325-384088 or 01325-380604

• For welfare issues concerning an adult or child, call 08702-402994

• If you are homeless, call 08702-402994

• If you are calling about the collection of a needle or an emergency on the Highway call 07966-347101

The council said the repairs will be carried out as quickly as possible.
